title: 2016 Worlds Playoffs
body: Is there a 3rd place match in Los Angeles  before the 2016 final?

replies.body:
As far as I'm aware, the 3rd spot in the finals will be decided by whoever takes the LCS Summer finals in Toronto. You can find a post about it [here.](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/na-summer-finals-coming-toronto)

Let me know if you have any questions.
